name: AVFragmentedMovie
desc: An object that represents a fragmented movie file.

items.name: static var tracks: AVAsyncProperty<Root, [AVFragmentedMovieTrack]>
items.desc: The tracks that a movie contains.

items.name: func loadTrack(withTrackID: CMPersistentTrackID, completionHandler: (AVFragmentedMovieTrack?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads a track that contains the specified identifier.

items.name: func loadTracks(withMediaType: AVMediaType, completionHandler: ([AVFragmentedMovieTrack]?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads tracks that contain media of a specified type.

items.name: func loadTracks(withMediaCharacteristic: AVMediaCharacteristic, completionHandler: ([AVFragmentedMovieTrack]?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads tracks that contain media of a specified characteristic.

items.name: var tracks: [AVFragmentedMovieTrack]
items.desc: The tracks that a movie contains.

items.name: func track(withTrackID: CMPersistentTrackID) -> AVFragmentedMovieTrack?
items.desc: Retrieves a track in the movie that contains the specified identifier.

items.name: func tracks(withMediaType: AVMediaType) -> [AVFragmentedMovieTrack]
items.desc: Retrieves tracks in the movie that present media of the specified type.

items.name: func tracks(withMediaCharacteristic: AVMediaCharacteristic) -> [AVFragmentedMovieTrack]
items.desc: Retrieves tracks in the movie that present media of the specified characteristic.
